title: Sportscast - October 24, 2015
text:
Sports » Sports Featured » Sportscast - October 24, 2015 Sports Featured 
Updated: Sat, Oct 24 2015, 10:42 PM 
The full sportscast from the Fox 28 News at 9 on Saturday, October 24th. Related Stories   Ed Thomas Coach of the Week Faith, Family, Football. Words of Inspiration from the Coach Ed Thomas Foundation. CBS 2 and FOX 28 in partnership with the Eastern Iowa Airport are looking for coaches who embody the spirit of Coach Thomas by having a strong impact on the community and on the sidelines. Nominate your favorite coach from any sport in the form below. Your Name: Tell us about your nomination: Please re-enter the code shown in the image below. AP News Wires 
LAMAR ODOM - THE INVESTIGATION 
LAS VEGAS (AP) -- While his health is getting better, Lamar Odom's legal situation might be in peril. Business News 
China cuts interest rates to spur slowing economy 
BEIJING (AP) -- China has cut interest rates for a sixth time in a year to spur slowing growth in the world's second-largest economy. 
IN THE NEWS: PANDORA PAYOUT 
LOS ANGELES (AP) -- Pandora will have to open its cashbox.
